sentences.en: All the wicked of the earth you discard like dross; therefore I love your statutes.
sentences.cn: 119凡地上的恶人、你除掉他好像除掉渣滓. 因此我爱你的法度.

sentences.en: All the wicked of the earth you dross; therefore I love your statutes.
sentences.cn: 凡地上的恶人、你除掉他好像除掉渣滓. 因此我爱你的法度.

sentences.en: Burning lips and a wicked heart are like a potsherd covered with silver dross.
sentences.cn: 23火热的嘴,奸恶的心,好像银渣包的瓦器.

sentences.en: Caroline felt the value of the true ore, and knew the deception of the flashy dross.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳辨别出了真金的价值, 知道那种炫耀的铁渣只有迷惑人的外表.

sentences.en: Experiments show the roasting process can be used for dechlorination of chlorine contained zinc dross.
sentences.cn: 含氯锌浮渣的焙烧试验结果表明,焙烧脱氯工艺是可行的.

sentences.en: Frequent skimming or improper skimming can cause a much higher dross loss.
sentences.cn: 撇渣过频或操作不当会使浮渣损失很大.

sentences.en: The best players go off to the big clubs, leaving us the dross.
sentences.cn: 最好的队员都投奔大俱乐部去了, 就只给我们剩下些不中用的人.

sentences.en: The paper presents design features and application of copper dross rotary kiln.
sentences.cn: 阐述了铜浮渣回转短窑的设计特点及实际应用情况.

sentences.en: The synthesis of 4 A zeolite was studied with aluminium dross and glass as the raw materials.
sentences.cn: 研究了以铝渣和水玻璃为原料合成4A型沸石的方法.

sentences.en: They are but the dross of silver.
sentences.cn: 他们都是炉中的铜,锡,铁,铅,都是银渣滓.

sentences.en: They tried to purge metal of dross.
sentences.cn: 他们试图清除金属熔化时浮升表面的渣滓.

sentences.en: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.
sentences.cn: 诗119:119凡地上的恶人、你除掉他好像除掉渣滓.因此我爱你的法度.

sentences.en: What's gold and silver ? Mere dross.
Your silver has become dross, your choice wine is diluted with water.
sentences.cn: 22你的银子,变为渣滓, 你的酒,用水搀对.

sentences.en: Your silver has become dross, Your drink diluted with water.
sentences.cn: 赛1:22你的银子、变为渣滓 、 你的酒、用水搀对.

trans.tran_cn: 废料，渣滓，劣质品，糟，熔渣
